title: BRIEF-India's DCB Bank flags growth risks due to current economic conditions
text:
BRIEF-India's DCB Bank flags growth risks due to current economic conditions

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Oct 19, 2019 17:19)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's DCB Bank flags growth risks due to current economic conditions Oct 19 (Reuters) - DCB Bank Ltd : * INDIA'S DCB BANK SAYS SEPT QUARTER NET PROFIT AT 914.1 MILLION RUPEES * INDIA'S DCB BANK SAYS NET INTEREST MARGIN FOR SEPT QUARTER AT 3.67% * INDIA'S DCB BANK SAYSGROSS NPA FOR SEPT QUARTER AT 2.09%, NET NPA AT 0.96% * INDIA'S DCB BANK SAYS CURRENT LEVEL OF ECONOMIC ACTIVITY POSES A CHALLENGE FOR GROWTH AS WELL AS NPA

BRIEF-India's DCB Bank flags growth risks due to current economic conditions
description: BRIEF-India's DCB Bank flags growth risks due to current economic conditions
